org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.platform.memory

Interface PlatformMemory

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PlatformAbstractMemory, PlatformExternalMemory, PlatformPooledMemory, PlatformUnpooledMemory

    public interface PlatformMemory
extends AutoCloseable
    Interop memory chunk.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int capacity()
      Gets capacity.
      void close()
      Close memory releasing it.

      Gets data pointer.

      Gets input stream.
      int length()
      Gets length.
      PlatformOutputStream output()
      Gets output stream.
      long pointer()
      Gets pointer which can be passed between platforms.
      void reallocate(int cap)
      Reallocate memory chunk.
